video.title: Sabrina's Secret Life
video.synopsis: Sabrina experiences magical mayhem at a secret witchcraft training academy in this animated spinoff of "Sabrina, the Teenage Witch."

episodes.synopsis: After a tough week, Sabrina escapes to "Dreamland" in the Netherworld to live out a glamorous fantasy life.
episodes.title: Living Her Dreams

episodes.synopsis: Both Sabrina and Cassandra want to ask Harvey to the school dance, but Maritza beats them to it.
episodes.title: At the Hop

episodes.synopsis: Sabrina is determined to become "the best" by beating Cassandra in the school fund-raiser.
episodes.title: School Spirit

episodes.synopsis: When Salem becomes the History of Warlocks professor, Sabrina is convinced she'll ace all her classes without doing any of the work.
episodes.title: Teacher's Pet

episodes.synopsis: Sabrina's tired of sharing Harvey with all of his extra activities, so she casts a spell on him so he'll be completely devoted to her!
episodes.title: I'm a Slave for Who?

episodes.synopsis: Sabrina leaves her class report on Attila the Hun to the last minute, then struggles to find information on him. So she conjures him up instead!
episodes.title: Putting Off

episodes.synopsis: Sabrina finds a forbidden spell book on Mr. Snipe's desk and casts a spell to make him fall in love with the first person he sees.
episodes.title: Matchmaker Sabrina

episodes.synopsis: Sabrina and Cassandra conjure up doppelgangers of themselves so that they can attend witch school and go to Harvey's party at the same time.
episodes.title: Sabrina, Part Two

episodes.synopsis: It's witch vs. witch in the annual spell-a-thon, and Sabrina is determined she is going to cast the biggest and best spell of all.
episodes.title: SPELL-ing Bee

episodes.synopsis: Hilda and Zelda are off to the Netherworld, so they hire an old-fashioned baby sitter to look after Sabrina.
episodes.title: And Baby Makes Three

episodes.synopsis: Sabrina's cauldron blows up and creates a purple invisibilty slime, which Cassandra uses to get closer to Harvey.
episodes.title: Half There

episodes.synopsis: Upset over Cassandra and Harvey's friendship, Sabrina accidentally creates a potion that brings her jealousy to life.
episodes.title: Green-Eyed Monster

episodes.synopsis: Sabrina uses a magic hair lotion that makes her hair smooth, silky and curly, but it causes mortals to turn into werewolves!
episodes.title: Lather, Rinse, Repeat

episodes.synopsis: While on cafeteria-cleaning duty, Sabrina casts a spell on the pots and pans so they'll clean themselves. Too bad they have ideas of their own!
episodes.title: Food 'Tude

episodes.synopsis: Sabrina gets the highly contagious gargoyle flu, and refuses to take Salem and her aunt's advice to stay in bed.
episodes.title: J'achoo

episodes.synopsis: Sabrina must visit the Netherworld Rumor Mill in order to get to the bottom of all the hurtful rumors that have been spreading around Greendale.
episodes.title: Just a Rumor

episodes.synopsis: Salem is suspicious of Sabrina's cute new pet hamster, Spunky.
episodes.title: Pet Peeve

episodes.synopsis: Sabrina helps Harvey train his dog for a dog show so that she can spend more time with him ... and also beat Cassandra.
episodes.title: Best of Show

episodes.synopsis: Sabrina casts a spell that sends her and Cassandra into an alternate world where everyone at Greendale High is a witch except for the two of them!
episodes.title: Here's Looking at You

episodes.synopsis: Sabrina takes a rock home from the Netherworld to add to her collection, but is surprised when the "rock" hatches into a baby dragon!
episodes.title: Hot Item

episodes.synopsis: Sabrina and Cassandra go on a mission to the Netherworld to find the rarest herb known to witches: Salviar Mascaria.
episodes.title: What's in a Name?

episodes.synopsis: Sabrina and Cassandra decide to compete in a Teen Talent Competition -- without magic -- and up the stakes so that a date with Harvey is on the line.
episodes.title: Greendale Idol

episodes.synopsis: Sabrina and Cassandra both use magic to sabotage each other's auditions to win the lead role opposite Harvey in the school play.
episodes.title: A Midsummer's Nightmare

episodes.synopsis: Salem goes undercover as a handsome young warlock at Greendale High after learning that an old nemesis has been released from the Netherworld jail.
episodes.title: Cat Man Do

episodes.synopsis: Sabrina and Maritza try to convince Cassandra that littering isn't cool.
episodes.title: Witchycology

episodes.synopsis: Sabrina buys a time-traveling watch after promising to go to a concert with Maritza as well as the Netherworld Spa with her aunts.
episodes.title: Time Flies
